类型: Size: MediumColor: One Black and One White Shirts
评论详情: I initially chose this shirt for its cotton/spandex blend, but I was so impressed by the flattering fit that I had to purchase more. It’s incredibly comfortable and versatile, making it perfect for work or travel. The boatneck design adds a stylish touch, and the length sits right at the waist, not overly cropped, but it doesn’t provide full tummy coverage. For my style, it works perfectly paired with pants or trousers, rather than jeans. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a comfortable yet polished top!

类型: Size: MediumColor: One Black and One White Shirts
评论详情: After washing, on gentle cycle, and drying partially on very low heat, the neck seams were mildly twisted.  I always purchase smalls but ordered in a medium as that was recommended, but the top creeps up if not tucked in. I planned to wear them through the winter but will not be able to wear the white as it’s thin.  The fabric is definitely warm so they are good for a warm base layer as they hold in body heat. The cut is extremely slim.  For reference I’m 130lbs and 36C.  These shirts are tight.  On the plus side, the length is great for short ladies who don’t want to deal with all the extra fabric /length so many tops have. I would only recommend these if someone is looking for a base layer and order a size up.

类型: Size: SmallColor: One Black and One Rosy Brown
评论详情: These are the only tops that had an accurate neckline to what was depicted.  I like higher boat neck styles with slim fit and NO ruching.  These tops were great and I plan to order more. :)

类型: Size: SmallColor: One Black and One Deep Red
评论详情: For what you're paying for and what you get these are a solid deal. They're very flattering especially the black long sleeve. I've washed them both now several times and have had no issues with color bleeding. When mine came I had to do some trimming of loose threads on both of the long sleeves on the shoulders but since then there has been no unraveling and they're holding up well. Because of the cut and lack of tag/label on the neck it can be hard to tell until you put the shirt on which side is the front and back which is a little annoying but overall these were a win and have been in my rotation.

类型: Size: LargeColor: One Black and One Grey Blue Tee
评论详情: I purchased the two pack long sleeve and two pack short sleeve that is blue and blk. I usually wear a size m/lg. I purchased the lg and the long sleeve fits and the bottom does not roll up. The short sleeve version fits tighter snd does roll up. I will return snd try XL.  The fabric is extremely soft and smooth. It is not sheer or shiny so if you get your proper size the fabric will be forgiving, meaning that it will not emphasize any lumps etc. it looks like a quality piece and staple that you can wear casually with cargo pants, or professionally with a pencil skirt or pants. Because of the material, this will be flattering on your arms whether your arms are smaller or larger, as long as you get your proper size. This will also disguise those chicken cutlets if you have a little extra weight between your arm pit and bra.  The waist stops perfectly right above your natural waist if you have an average size torso. This will not be a short top that will show your stomach. It is however fitted and therefore if you want to show off some abs, you can tuck under and still look neat.  Highly recommended for ruler. Inverted triangle and pear shapes. NOT RECOMMENDED FOR APPLE SHAPE BRVSUSE THIS WILL EMPHASIZE YOUR PROBLEM AREA.  Recommended pairings: Ruler or inverted triangle shaped: Yoga pants, jeans, pencil skirt  For pear shape: Cargo pants or skirt, maxi skirt  Recommendation: Size up one size to prevent the shirt bottom from rolling up.  Hope this helps someone.
